page.title: 19CHANGING TIMES (CONT)
page.content: YOUNGSTERS TODAY ARE LIKELY TO SPEND THEIR POCKET_MONEY IN SYDNEY DEVINE LEISURE CENTER.FIFTY YEARS AGO LIFE SEEMED JUST AS VARIED AND EXCITING WITH KITING AT BIRKENSHAW,QUOTINNG, BIRD_CATCHING AND THE FAIR'S AMUSEMENTS ON OFFER. THE COMMENT "WHEN I CAME HOME FROM ENGLAND I GOT LOST" BY ONE "OLD_TIMER" SUMS UP THE CHANGES LARKHALL HAS UNDERGONE.ALTHOUGH THE FEELING OF A CLOSE_KNIT COMMUNITY IS NO LONGER AS OBVIOUS THANKS IN PART TO THE SPRAWLING NATURE OF HOUSING SCHEMES BUILT SINCE WORLD WAR TWO,"LARKIE" CAN BE PROUD OF ITS PAST AND LOOK FORWARD TO THE FUTURE EXPECTANTLY AS EXTENSION WORK TO THE SPORTS CENTRE NEARS COMPLETION.
